channel.title: F3rajabi on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS
channel.description: Recent content in F3rajabi on QUANTUM INFORMATION WITH TRAPPED IONS

item.title: Dr. Fereshteh Rajabi
item.description: Fereshteh was a postdoctoral fellow, working on theoretical aspects of trapped-ion physics. She developed hybrid digital-analog quantum simulation protocols, and investigated optical trapping schemes for ions.
